subject: College Athletics
Golf
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M’s Bronson Burgoon hit a gap wedge from the rough to within 3 inches of the 18th hole to win his match in Toledo, Ohio, and clinch the first N.C.A.A. Division I men’s title for the Aggies.
snippet: Texas A&M’s Bronson Burgoon hit a gap wedge from the rough to within 3 inches of the 18th hole to win his match in Toledo, Ohio, and clinch the first N.C.A.A. Division I men’s title for the Aggies.
